com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.db.utils
Class SingleVectorialDBConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.db.utils.SingleVectorialDBConnectionManager

public class SingleVectorialDBConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to handle connections properly. One connection instance per (db, user, gvsig session)

Author:
jldominguez

getConnection

public ConnectionWithParams getConnection(java.lang.String _drvName,
                                          java.lang.String _user,
                                          java.lang.String _pw,
                                          java.lang.String _name,
                                          java.lang.String _host,
                                          java.lang.String _port,
                                          java.lang.String _db,
                                          boolean _connected)
                                   throws DBException
Creates a new connection with its parameters if not created yet.

Parameters:
_drvName - driver name
_user - user name
_pw - password
_name - connection name
_host - host url
_port - port number as string
_db - database name
_connected - whether or not to connect the connection
Returns:
the connection with parameters object
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
DBException
